    Peer-reviewed articles

    Berger, J., M. Biel, and F.P. Hayes. 2022. Species conflict at Earth’s edges – Contests, climate, and coveted resources. Frontiers in Ecology and Evolution. 10:991714. [Read Open Access, View PDF]

    Hayes, F.P., J.J. Millspaugh, E.J. Bergman, R.M. Callaway, and C.J. Bishop. 2022. Effects of willow nutrition and morphology on calving success of moose. Journal of Wildlife Management, 86(2). [Link, Email for PDF]

    Hayes, F.P., M.J. Dodrill, B.S. Gerig, C. Finch, and W.E. Pine, III. 2017. Body condition of endangered Humpback Chub in relation to temperature and discharge in the lower Colorado River.
